quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: 7th Heaven and Simon
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, kevins, tv. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of the Camdens dog on 7th Heaven?
Did Mary file for divorce from Carlos on the TV drama 7th Heaven?
Zack wishes for super powers when he sees a shooting star in an episode of The Suite Life of Zack  Cody.
On the TV show The Suite Life of Zack  Cody, Zacks got the ability to mind read.
On the TV show 7th Heaven, Rose was engaged to Simon.
What was the pilot episode of The Waltons called?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Homecoming: A Christmas Story

questions.question: In the Suite Life of Zack  Cody, who does Zack think is the most wonderful person in the world?
Is it true that on the TV show 7th Heaven, Lucy and Kevin have two dogs, named Sampson and Delilah?
Did Simon and Rose get married on the TV show 7th Heaven?
What is the name of Lucy and Kevins daughter on the TV show 7th Heaven?
On what holiday were the twins Sam and David Camden born in the TV series 7th Heaven?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Valentines Day

questions.question: Who did Lucy marry in Season 7 of 7th Heaven?
How many sisters does 7th Heaven character Simon have?
Zack, one of the main characters on the sitcom The Suite Life of Zack  Cody, is smart and loves homework.
On the TV show The Suite Life of Zack  Cody , what does the girl in Zacks summer school class do to cover her head?

options.text: puts her hands over her face
covers her head with a jacket
puts a bag over her head

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: puts a bag over her head

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: William Collins

questions.question: On the TV show The Real World: New York, the group finds a stray dog and name him what?

options.text: milk a half gallon out of a cow and then drink it
repel down the outside of a tower

questions.question: In the TV series The Suite Life of Zack  Cody, what does Zack get from his dad on graduation day?
During the finale of the TV show The Apprentice season 1, what previously-fired contestant revealed that she was pregnant?

What is Lorens supernatural forté on the show Angel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Telling peoples fortunes

Which of these Angel characters was not attracted to Cordelia?
Where is violence impossible on the show Angel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In the night club

options.text: His girlfriend tried to kill him.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Willie Nelson

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Miss Hoover
